text: Curraghboy () is a village in County Roscommon, Ireland. It lies northwest of Athlone on the R362 regional road. It has one public house and two grocery shops. It also has an indoor handball alley, Roman Catholic church and a national (primary) school. ==See also== * List of towns and villages in Ireland ==References== Category:Towns and villages in County Roscommon
title: Curraghboy
